Texts.Chs: 把^orange;克苏鲁雕像^reset;带给^green;花坛旁边的入迷的科学家^reset;。(在^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Cthulhu Statue^reset; to the ^green;obsessed scientist by the flower beds^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我一直痴迷于古代文明，真的。我听说某个^orange;远古种族^reset;曾经漫游于群星之间。如果你能给我带回一个^orange;克苏鲁雕像^reset;，我会好好报答你的。
Texts.Eng: I am obsessed with ancient civilizations. Truly. I hear tell of an ^orange;elder race^reset; that once wandered the stars. If you can ^orange;bring me a Cthulhu Statue^reset; I would reward you very well.

Texts.Chs: 这真是一尊^green;令人惊叹的工艺品^reset;，但是看起来古怪而狂乱。你的奖励？当然，我怎么会忘记呢。这是我所有的积蓄，但足够支付你的费用了。
Texts.Eng: This is a ^green;breathtaking specimen^reset;, but oddly maddening to look at. Your reward? Of course! It's all I have in savings, but it should cover your costs.
